Html:
I can successfully build and run most of the Prism 4,
Drop 8 libraries and samples under Silverlight,
but I get the following exception when I run
either the ModularityWithMef.Silverlight or
ModularityWithUnity.Silverlight samples under IE8
on XP32:

  Line: 54
  Error: Unhandled Error in Silverlight Application
  Code: 2103   
  Category: InitializeError      
  Message: Invalid or malformed application: Check manifest    
 
Strangely, these same Silverlight samples run fine
under the Firefox browser, but not under IE.

Any suggestions?

Thanks,
Alex

Hi Alex,

Thanks for your feedback. I will copy this as a work-item, so the product team will be notified. Additionally, other users could vote this.

There is no other similar issues reported in Prism so far. However, in the Silverlight forum there is a similar thread answered. It might help to solve your scenario:

  • InitializeError- Invalid or malformed application: Check manifest

Thanks again,
